title: 3 and Out -  Patriots Decline, Jordan Love Value, Becton Bust, Bears Eyeroll, Camp Buzz
itunes:title: 3 and Out -  Patriots Decline, Jordan Love Value, Becton Bust, Bears Eyeroll, Camp Buzz
description:
John explains why he thinks this season is the beginning of the decline of the Patriots, why this preseason is huge for Jordan Love increasing his value, why Mekhi Becton busting is a mark on Jets GM Joe Douglas’ record, why he’s into the new Lions’ Hard Knocks, why he’s not buying Matt Eberflus and the Bears new regime. He also hits on some training camp notes from around the league, including Jimmy G to the Browns rumors. 

Subscribe NOW and follow Middlekauff and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content. It's always  FanDuel for the best wagering action! #herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
